OOC:( Ok It was a joke. A bad joke, but a joke.  yes ai know about 
bats.  I work with them.  But the charater wasn't pauing attention 
and ran into a beam. It was a joke and..oh never mind)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> (OOC: logo, just to let you know, bat's are not blind. Fruit bats 
don't use ecolocation to find fruit. It's kind pointless to try and 
use movement to find something that doesn't move. So they see better 
then humans. Sorry to seem like I'm yelling, but I hate when people 
insult bats, sharks, and other creatures like that.)
> 
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     He was watching on his video screens as Bobertron and Pantron 
left the base to attack the Pred base. 
>     "Magmatron, Transform," He said. He then folded his wings over 
his body like a cloak. (Like BM Megatron, but without the helmet and 
extra arms. Also Magmatron's wings are solid, not torn strips like 
Megs) He walked around the room trying to decide what to do. Then he 
got a paing of pain. His enternal systems knew what it was and told 
him instantly.
>     "Magmatron, Beast Mode," He transformed and took off towards 
the ocean. Upon reaching the waters he took a dive. The salt water 
repelinished his systems. He went into Robot mode and walked out of 
the water.
>     "Hmm...it seems I don't run on energon anymore," He said to 
himself. "Well, I will need to be near an ocean if I am to stay 
online. But the base isn't near one. It will have to move."
> (It doesn't have thrusters, and is still somewhat stuck in the 
rock. He's going to create a landslide to move it.)
